name: Dr. Stone (Boichi) Anime Style LoRA
description:
Dr. Stone (Boichi) Anime style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕


From the first season of Dr. Stone. I love the author and I wanted to capture some of his style, but I'm also a bit into anime styles at the moment.

Should work perfectly on AnyLoRA at weight 1. Increase accuracy with boichi anime style. For the manga style try out this LoRA instead.

Remember this is not a character LoRA. It can come close to some characters from their description but you'll need proper character embeddings or LoRA to make them accurate.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)

meta.prompt: boichi anime style,  1girl, arm behind head, arm up, armpits, blonde hair, blue dress, blue eyes, breasts, choker, cleavage, contrapposto, dress, upper body, looking at viewer, medium breasts, solo, thighs, outdoors, white choker, ((masterpiece)) <lora:boichi_anime_style_offset:1>
